amendment.description: To provide for necessary beneficiary protections in order to ensure access to coverage under the Medicare part D prescription drug program.

action.text: Amendment SA 2730 proposed by Senator Nelson FL to Amendment SA 2707.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2730.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2730 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 45. Record Vote Number: 5.
Ruled out of order by the chair.
